blogPost.excerpt: A growing list of various types of emails (promotional, newsletter, onboarding, etc.) from the best brands, breaking down and highlighting everything you need to know about each email. Learn how the top brands create their emails!
blogPost.body: A growing list of various types of emails (promotional, newsletter, onboarding, etc.) from the best brands, breaking down and highlighting everything you need to know about each email. Learn how the top brands create their emails!
blogPost.title: Email Spotlights - The best brand emails, annotated.
blogPost.author: Alec Beglarian

localize.description: 来自最佳品牌的各种类型的电子邮件（促销、通讯、入职等）的不断增长的列表，分解并突出你需要知道的关于每封电子邮件的一切。了解顶级品牌如何创建他们的电子邮件!
來自最佳品牌的各種類型的電子郵件（促銷、通訊、入職等）的不斷增長的列表，分解並突出你需要知道的關於每封電子郵件的一切。瞭解頂級品牌如何創建他們的電子郵件!

previous.excerpt: A time tracking app focused on life itself rather than projects, tasks, and more specific types. It helps to generalize a day and make it easier to document your life. It just takes 5 seconds to log your day. You don't have to remember each minute.
previous.title: Horae - Measure your life, log your hours and document your life

localize.description: 一款专注于生活本身的时间追踪应用，而不是项目、任务和更具体的类型。它有助于概括一天的生活，让你更容易记录生活。它只需要5秒钟就可以记录你的一天。你不必记住每一分钟。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，记录你的时间，记录你的生活。

localize.description: 一款專注於生活本身的時間追蹤應用，而不是項目、任務和更具體的類型。它有助於概括一天的生活，讓你更容易記錄生活。它只需要5秒鐘就可以記錄你的一天。你不必記住每一分鐘。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，記錄你的時間，記錄你的生活。
